title: Learning Analytics-Based Object-Oriented Instructional Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic concepts in social sciences
context.additional_context: Customized education design competency enhancement for social problem-solving in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will construct three or more project-based learning pathways using a structured instructional design framework organized by learning objects.
Learners will analyze learner behavior data collected in mobile environments and develop strategies to achieve 80% or higher individual engagement rates.

Learners will define at least three analytical metrics for monitoring learning outcomes (e.g., progress rates, interaction frequency, assessment scores) and generate interpretable reports without visualization tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
